title: Task Templates & Bundles
description: Pre-configured task sequences for common GST litigation workflows that ensure consistent case handling and comprehensive compliance coverage.

buttons.name: Create Template
buttons.purpose: Design new task templates for recurring GST workflows with customizable task sequences and deadlines
buttons.gstExample: Create 'GST Assessment Appeal' template with tasks for notice analysis, grounds preparation, evidence collection, and filing

buttons.name: Apply Template
buttons.purpose: Apply existing templates to new cases or when cases advance to specific stages
buttons.gstExample: Apply 'GST Audit Response' template immediately when audit notice is received to ensure all compliance requirements are addressed

buttons.name: Edit Template
buttons.purpose: Modify existing templates to adapt to regulation changes or improved practice procedures
buttons.gstExample: Update 'GST Refund Claim' template when new documentation requirements are introduced by tax authorities

buttons.name: Clone Template
buttons.purpose: Create variations of existing templates for similar but distinct GST scenarios
buttons.gstExample: Clone 'GST Assessment Appeal' template to create 'GST Penalty Challenge' template with modified task priorities

buttons.name: View Usage Analytics
buttons.purpose: Track template performance and identify opportunities for workflow optimization
buttons.gstExample: Analyze 'GST Hearing Preparation' template success rates to optimize task sequences and timing

philosophy: Task templates embody institutional knowledge and best practices in GST litigation. They transform expert knowledge into systematic workflows that ensure junior practitioners follow the same high standards as senior advocates. In GST practice, where procedural compliance is critical and deadlines are non-negotiable, templates provide the consistency and completeness that distinguish professional practices.

examples.solution: Template includes: (1) Assessment order analysis task, (2) Grounds identification and legal research, (3) Supporting document compilation, (4) Appeal drafting with precedent review, (5) Filing and service tasks with deadline tracking
examples.benefit: Comprehensive appeal preparation, consistent quality, no missed procedural requirements, improved success rates

examples.solution: Template sequence: (1) Eligibility verification task, (2) Documentation compilation checklist, (3) Application preparation and review, (4) Filing and acknowledgment tracking, (5) Follow-up milestone tasks at 60/90/180 days
examples.benefit: Systematic refund processing, proactive follow-up, improved recovery timelines, client satisfaction

examples.solution: Comprehensive template: (1) Audit notice analysis, (2) Document inventory and compilation, (3) Response strategy development, (4) Draft response preparation, (5) Client consultation and approval, (6) Submission and follow-up tracking
examples.benefit: Organized audit response, complete documentation, strategic approach, reduced penalty exposure

examples.solution: Emergency template: (1) Immediate client notification, (2) Advocate dispatch coordination, (3) Document protection strategy, (4) Rights advisement and representation, (5) Post-search follow-up and challenge preparation
examples.benefit: Rapid response capability, client protection, procedural compliance, minimized business disruption

examples.solution: Template workflow: (1) Cancellation order analysis, (2) Compliance status verification, (3) Revival application preparation, (4) Supporting documentation assembly, (5) Hearing preparation and representation tasks
examples.benefit: Swift registration restoration, business continuity protection, comprehensive compliance review

bestPractices.title: Standard Operating Procedures
bestPractices.description: Use templates to embed your practice's standard operating procedures for consistent service delivery
bestPractices.gstApplication: Ensure all GST assessment challenges follow the same thorough analysis and preparation process

bestPractices.title: Deadline Management
bestPractices.description: Build appropriate buffer time into template deadlines to account for complexity and review cycles
bestPractices.gstApplication: Set GST appeal tasks to complete 5 days before actual deadline to allow for final review and filing

bestPractices.title: Quality Control
bestPractices.description: Include review and approval tasks in templates to maintain quality standards
bestPractices.gstApplication: Mandatory senior advocate review for all GST appeal submissions before filing

bestPractices.title: Continuous Improvement
bestPractices.description: Regularly update templates based on case outcomes and process improvements
bestPractices.gstApplication: Update GST audit response templates when new documentation requirements or procedures are introduced

customization.description: Configure which tasks must be completed before others can begin
customization.gstExample: GST assessment analysis must be completed before appeal grounds can be drafted

customization.description: Include tasks that are only created based on specific case characteristics
customization.gstExample: Add penalty challenge tasks only when assessment includes penalty charges

customization.description: Automatically assign tasks to appropriate team members based on expertise
customization.gstExample: Assign research tasks to junior associates and court appearances to senior advocates

customization.description: Include automated client updates at key milestones in the template workflow
customization.gstExample: Send client progress updates when GST appeal is filed and when hearing date is received
